CoreFeatureImplementation.justification: All features were attempted but passthrough was not implemented and custom shaders were only partially completed.

UserInteractionAndExperience.justification: Most user interactions were implemented correctly with minor omissions.

AssetAndSceneManagement.justification: The application correctly loads all specified assets from the ticket.

ValidProjectStructure.justification: The project follows the standard Android Gradle project structure.

GradleConfiguration.justification: Gradle files are well-formed and contain all necessary dependencies but have a minor misconfiguration.

ManifestConfiguration.justification: The Android manifest correctly declares all required activities and permissions.

CodeSyntax.justification: The code is free of obvious syntax errors.

ImportResolution.justification: All imports are valid and consistent with the project's dependencies.

CorrectApiUsage.justification: The agent correctly utilized all the relevant SDK APIs as intended.

IdiomaticSdkPatterns.justification: The project follows most of the recommended SDK patterns.

ResourceManagement.justification: Resource management is present and robust.

AdherenceToConventions.justification: The code consistently adheres to Kotlin and Android coding conventions.

CodeReadabilityAndStructure.justification: The code is well-structured and generally easy to follow.

CodeModularityAndReusability.justification: The code demonstrates good modularity with minimal duplication.

NullSafetyAndErrorHandling.justification: Null safety is handled but error handling is minimal.
